comment._content: Petra is in Jordan, not Syria.

comment.author: 63055726@N07
comment._content: yeas Petra is in Jordan, not Syria.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Good point, Miss-Colleen and mhmd-kassem. We transcribe the captions directly from the old lantern slides, so sometimes the information is a bit (!) outdated.  In this case, the "Syria" designation dates from around 1900, before Jordan became a separate country in 1921. I'm going to bounce this to our Archivist to see how she thinks we should adjust the caption to reflect that. 
Thanks for your help,
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
All set. Thanks for your help.
Deb Wythe
